package_description: HUGE Mercadian Masques–style package that models the set’s core mechanics: Rebels & Mercenaries (recruit chains), Spellshapers (tap + discard to mimic spells), alternate casting costs (free spells, life/return lands/exile a [C] card/opponent gains life), Rishadan-style taxation enters-the-battlefield triggers, depletion lands, and storage lands. Includes broad ad‑lib pools for names/tokens/phrases and big effect template catalogs for each color.
